attributes.action: We demand the imposition of economic sanctions against the Lukashenko regime!
attributes.additional_details:
CEC of Belarus has announced the final results of the presidential election which are simulated. Tomorrow, 14/8, an extraordinary meeting of the EU Foreign Affairs Council is scheduled, at which the heads of the European Union will decide the Belarusian question.
Belarus spoke after 26 years, and we can no longer be silenced.
We demand the UK and EU sanctions against the Lukashenko Dictatorship because we want the democracy, freedom of elections, freedom of the press and the political prisoners!
attributes.background: It is essential today to urgently sign a petition to the heads of the UK and the European Union requesting the imposition of economic sanctions against the Lukashenko regime. The human rights are violated, no freedom of expression and press, 7.500 political prisoners held in unbearable conditions.
